content: this easy-level pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through creating a beautifully textured washcloth the finished piece measures 7 5 inches by 7 5 inches making it a versatile addition to your home using cascade yarns ® ultra pima dk yarn you ll enjoy working with a soft and durable material that adds a touch of luxury to your everyday routine elevate your crochet skills with this elegant washcloth pattern **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels detailed written instructions and video tutorial textured design adds interest and functionality made with soft and durable cascade yarns ® ultra pima dk yarn finished washcloth measures 7 5 inches by 7 5 inches **materials needed-** yarn cascade yarns ® ultra pima dk 77 yards hook 3 5mm us size 4 0 gauge 19 stitches by 13 row = 4 inches **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www
